FOOTER_DESC: AI tools for collaborative, international wildlife conservation
FOOTER_COPYRIGHT: {year} © Conservation X Labs | All Rights Reserved
MERGE_PENDING_MESSAGE: Merge of <bold>{indv2}</bold> into <bold>{indv1}</bold> has been initiated. Auto completion date: <bold>{mergeDate}</bold>, 2 week delayed execution.
MERGE_DENIED_MESSAGE: A merge of <bold>{indv2}</bold> into <bold>{indv1}</bold> was <bold>denied</bold>. Initiated by <bold>{initiator}</bold>. Denied by user: <bold>{deniedBy}</bold>
MERGE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE: A merge of <bold>{indv2}</bold> into <bold>{indv1}</bold> was <bold>completed</bold>. Initiated by <bold>{initiator}</bold>. Completion date: <bold>{mergeDate}</bold>
BANNER_ALERT: Wildbook is getting a new look! Thank you for your patience as we make these changes.
ERROR_PAGE_NOT_FOUND_DESC: The page you're looking for doesn't exist. It may have been moved or deleted. Go back to home page.
ERROR_PAGE_SERVER_ERROR_DESC: Oops! Something went wrong on our end. We're working to fix it. Try refreshing the page in a few minutes.
ERROR_PAGE_UNAUTHORIZED_DESC: You need to log in to view this page. Please log in or contact support if you're having trouble.
ERROR_PAGE_FORBIDDEN_DESC: You don't have permission to access this page. If you think this is an error, contact support.
ERROR_PAGE_BAD_REQUEST_DESC: Your browser sent a request that this server could not understand. Please check the URL or contact us for help.
FILTER_LOCATION_DESC: Use the fields below to filter your search based on location
FILTER_VERBATIM_LOCATION_DESC: Enter an exact or partial search
FILTER_DATE_DESC: Use the fields below to limit the timeframe of your search
FILTER_OBSERVATION_ATTRIBUTE_DESC: Use the fields below to filter your search based on observed attributes
FILTER_OBSERVATION_COMMENTS_DESC: Enter an exact or partial match. Results are not case-sensitive
FILTER_IMAGE_LABEL_DESC: Use the fields below to limit your search based on metadata related to photographs
FILTER_HAS_AT_LEAST_ONE_ASSOCIATED_PHOTO: Has at least one associated photo or video
FILTER_KEYWORDS_DESC: Select one or more keyword. To require all selected keywords, check Use AND operator
FILTER_LABELLED_KEYWORDS_DESC: Select one or more labelled keyword value. To require all selected keywords, check Use AND operator
FILTER_IDENTITY_DESC: Use the fields below to limit your search based on associated individual
FILTER_NO_INDIVIDUAL_ID: Include only encounters with no assigned Individual ID
FILTER_TAGS_DESC: Use the fields below to limit your search to specific tags
FILTER_BIOLOGICAL_SAMPLE_DESC: Use the fields below to limit your search based on biological samples and resulting analyses
FILTER_SOCIAL_DESC: Use the fields below to limit your search based on social connections
FILTER_METADATA_DESC: Use the fields below to limit your search based on platform-related data
FILTER_SUBMITTER: Submitter, Photographer, or Email Address. This field is NOT case-sensitive
APPLY_SEARCH_ID_DESC: This feature allows users to share their search criteria with others easily. After performing a search, a user can copy their unique Search ID and share it with another user. The recipient can then paste this Search ID into the "Apply Search ID" section and click "Apply" to replicate the exact search criteria, obtaining the same results as the original user.
CITATION_TITLE: How to Cite Wildbook and Collaborative Data
CITATION_INTRODUCTION: Even if a collaborative link has been made between users, Wildbook requests you to contact the data provider(s) for use of any and all data shared in a collaboration if it is to be used in any publication, product, or commercial application.
CITATION_AGREEMENT: By using any Wildbook the user agrees to the following:
CITATION_AGREEMENT_ITEM_1: Not to use data contained in Wildbook in any publication, product, or commercial application without prior written consent of the original data provider.
CITATION_AGREEMENT_ITEM_2: To cite both the data provider(s) and Wildbook appropriately after approval of use is obtained.
CITATION_AGREEMENT_ITEM_2_SUBITEM_1: Collaborative datasets should list all data contributors in descending order of quantity of encounters contributed. The year should be listed as the year when the dataset was pooled and downloaded.
CITATION_AGREEMENT_ITEM_2_SUBITEM_2: Citation template for a Wildbook-based dataset used in a paper:
CITATION_CITATION_DETAILS_1: <Data owner names>. (n.d.). <Wildbook Name> [Online database]. <Wildbook URL>. Accessed <Day> <Month> <Year>.
CITATION_CITATION_DETAILS_2: Tanya Y. Berger-Wolf, Daniel I. Rubenstein, Charles V. Stewart, Jason A. Holmberg, Jason Parham, Sreejith Menon, Jonathan Crall, Jon Van Oast, Emre Kiciman, & Lucas Joppa. (2017). Wildbook: Crowdsourcing, computer vision, and data science for conservation. https://arxiv.org/abs/1710.08880
CITATION_FORWARD: To forward the citation of any publication / report that made use of the data / tools provided by Wild Me for inclusion in our list of references by submitting to info@wildme.org.
CITATION_DISCLAIMER: Not to hold Wild Me or the original data providers liable for errors in the data. While we have made every effort to ensure the quality of the database, we cannot guarantee the accuracy of these datasets.
SESSION_WARNING_CONTENT: Your session is about to expire.
SESSION_LOGIN_MODAL_CONTENT: You've been logged out of the system.
REPORT_PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Tell us about the animal you saw and be as specific as you can. For citizen scientists: You grant unlimited usage of this data for research and conservation purposes only.
SIGNIN_REMINDER_BANNER: To associate encounter with your account, please sign in. If you want to continue anonymously, complete the captcha.
SIGNIN_CAPTCHACOMPLETE_REMINDER_BANNER: Thank you for verifying! Continue with your anonymous submission or sign in.
SUPPORTED_FILETYPES: We support .jpg, .jpeg, .png, and bmp. Files cannot exceed
PHOTO_INSTRUCTION: Drag and drop your files here or browse
DATE_INSTRUCTION: Type or select the date of the encounter. If entering less than the date, typing is preferred to prevent error.
SPECIES_REQUIRED_IA_WARNING: Species must be set for the detection model to run.
CONTACT_INSTRUCTION: Provide email if you want these people to get email updates about this encounter.
CSL_EMAILS_INSTRUCTION: Provide a comma separated list of additional emails that needs to be notified about this encounter
SUBMIT_ANON_CONFIRM_DESCRIPTION: If you submit without logging in, you wont be able to associate this data with your account later.
IMAGES_REQUIRED_ANON_WARNING: Images are required for anonymous submission. Add images or
FILE_SIZE_EXCEEDED: Images exceeding the limit will not be uploaded
SUBMISSION_SUCCESS_ALERT: Thank you for submitting your encounter!
CONTACT_MESSAGE: For questions or concerns, contact us at
INVALID_FILES_MESSAGE: The following files could not be uploaded. Check the {link} and try uploading again.
INVALID_DATETIME_WARNING: Enter a valid date. Supported formats include YYYY, YYYY-MM, YYYY-MM-DD, and date-time formats like YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM.
LOCATION_ID_DESCRIPTION: Find the location id using the text or the map. Try to be as specific as possible.
LOCATION_ID_REQUIRED_WARNING: Location ID is required to establish match sets.
MISSING_REQUIRED_FIELDS: Missing required fields or incorrect field values. Please review the form and try again.
BEERROR_REQUIRED: Could not submit; missing required field:
BEERROR_INVALID: Could not submit; field format was invalid:
BEERROR_UNKNOWN: Could not submit due to unknown error.
ANON_UPLOAD_IMAGE_WARNING: Images cannot be uploaded until captcha is complete.
INPUT_PAGE_ALERT: Please enter a valid page number between 1 and {totalPages}.
FILTER_INDIVIDUAL_ESTIMATE_DESC: Use the fields below to filter your search based on individual estimate
SEARCH_RESULT_DISPLAY: Your search results will appear here
NO_TAXONOMY: Set a taxonomy on the encounter page to view IA Class.
BULK_IMPORT_PHOTO_INSTRUCTION: Drag and drop your folder or files here or browse files you want to upload
BULK_IMPORT_UPLOAD_IMAGE_DESC_PART_1: The image file names should correspond exactly to the file names in the “Encounter.MediaAsset” column in your Wildbook Standard Format Spreadsheet. Images should be less than {maxSize}MB. You can only upload {maxImageCount} images at a time.
BULK_IMPORT_UPLOAD_IMAGE_DESC_PART_2: Only JPEG, JPG, and PNG formats are supported. Files in other formats will be ignored.
BULK_IMPORT_TABLE_REVIEW_DESC: When you are satisfied with the data in this page, start the bulk import. It might take a long time for the process to complete the bulk import, please do not close the window until it is done.
BULK_IMPORT_SET_LOCATION_DESC: Set Location ID to be applied for Identification.
BULK_IMPORT_SET_PREFERENCE_DESC: Set your preferences for the bulk import. You can choose to set a location ID for identification, skip the identification step, or skip the detection.
BULK_IMPORT_INSTRUCTIONS_DESCRIPTION: Bulk Import lets you upload data for multiple encounters at once. Preparing your spreadsheet for upload is the most important step.
BULK_IMPORT_INSTRUCTIONS_STEP0_CONTENT: Prepare your spreadsheet and images using the guidance in our {helpDocsLink}.
BULK_IMPORT_INSTRUCTIONS_STEP1_PLACE_IMA: Place all your images in a single folder
BULK_IMPORT_INSTRUCTIONS_STEP1_LETTERS_N: Use only letters from the English alphabet, numbers, periods and spaces
BULK_IMPORT_INSTRUCTIONS_STEP1_MATCH_ENT: Exactly match entries in the Encounter.mediaAsset column of your spreadsheet
BULK_IMPORT_INSTRUCTIONS_STEP2_USE_TEMPL: Refer to {link} for information on how to prepare your spreadsheet.
BULK_IMPORT_INSTRUCTIONS_STEP2_MEDIA_ASS: Make sure the Encounter.mediaAsset values match your filenames exactly.
BULK_IMPORT_INSTRUCTIONS_STEP2_ACCEPTED_: Encounter.genus should always begin with a capital letter and Encounter.specificEpithet should always begin with a lowercase letter.
BULK_IMPORT_INSTRUCTIONS_STEP3_CONTENT: Review your spreadsheets and fix errors directly on the site – no need to reupload for small changes!
BULK_IMPORT_INSTRUCTIONS_STEP4_TITLE: Step 4: Set Location ID for Identification
BULK_IMPORT_INSTRUCTIONS_STEP4_CONTENT: Select the Location ID to find match candidates after import. This triggers automatic detection and identification after import — no manual steps needed later.
BULK_IMPORT_INSTRUCTIONS_NEED_HELP_DOCS: Check the {wildbookDocsLink} for troubleshooting or contact support
BULK_IMPORT_FAILED_DESC: There was an error while processing your submission.
BULK_IMPORT_SUCCESS_DESC: Your submission was successful and is now being processed in the background. You can track the progress of this task from the bulk import task details page.
BULK_IMPORT_CONTINUE_MODAL_DESC: You have an unfinished bulk report saved as a draft. Would you like to continue working on it or create a new bulk report? Please note that starting a new report will erase all your current progress and any data uploaded for this bulk import.
BULK_IMPORT_CONTINUE_DESC: Your last bulk import is still being processed in the background. You can check its progress from the bulk import task page. Would you like to start another import?
BULK_IMPORT_APPLY_TO_ALL_ROWS_BODY: Do you want to apply this {columnId} value ({newValue}) to all rows?
SUBMISSION_ISSUE_HEADER: There are some issues with your submission:
BULK_IMPORT_ERROR_INVALID_VALUE: The value you entered is invalid
BULK_IMPORT_ERROR_INVALID_IMAGE: The image you uploaded is invalid
APPLY_TO_ALL_ROWS_NOTE: + denotes change can apply to all rows for this column
BULK_IMPORT_ERROR_MESSAGE: There are issues with your data. Please see the error messages displayed below the table.
BULKIMPORT_ERROR_INVALID_DATEFORMAT: Invalid data. Date must be "YYYY", "YYYY-MM", "YYYY-MM-DD", "YYYY-MM-DDTHH", or "YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm" and cannot be in the future.
BULKIMPORT_ERROR_INVALID_INVALIDDATEMILL: Invalid data. Must be a valid date in milliseconds.
BULKIMPORT_ERROR_INVALID_INVALIDINTEGER: Invalid data. Must be an integer.
BULKIMPORT_ERROR_INVALID_INVALIDISODATE: Invalid value. Must be a valid ISO date.
BULKIMPORT_ERROR_INVALID_INVALIDLATLONG: Invalid latitude, longitude format. Use 'lat, long' (e.g., '34.05, -118.25').
BULKIMPORT_ERROR_INVALID_INVALIDNUMBER: Invalid data. Must be a number.
BULKIMPORT_ERROR_INVALID_INVALIDSTRING: Invalid data. Must be a string.
BULKIMPORT_ERROR_INVALID_SYNONYMFIELDS: Invalid data: you can only use one of the following synonymous fields: {list}. Please delete all but one of these fields before proceeding.
BULKIMPORT_ERROR_INVALID_LABELEDKEYWORDI: Invalid value for ${col} — must be one of: {allowedValues}.
BULKIMPORT_ERROR_INVALID_UNKNOWNCOLUMN: Unknown column — may not be processed
BULK_IMPORT_DELETE_TASK_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete this import task?
BULK_IMPORT_TASK_ERROR_DEFAULT: You task failed to process due to an error.
BULK_IMPORT_LOCATION_ID_DESC: The more options you select, the longer identification takes. Be as specific as possible.
BULK_IMPORT_SEND_TO_IDENTIFICATION_DISAB: Button is disabled if detection or initial identification task is incomplete. Please wait for the task to complete before sending to identification.
MATCH_DESC_1: Choose the algorithm and set filters to refine your search.
CONFIRM_DELETE_CONTACT: Are you sure you want to remove this contact?
CONFIRM_DELETE_ANNOTATION: Are you sure you want to delete this annotation?
CONFIRM_DELETE_IMAGE: Are you sure you want to delete this image?
CONFIRM_REMOVE_PROJECT: Are you sure you want to remove encounter from project
NUMBER_MEDIAASSETS: Number media assets (photos, videos, etc.) collected
NUMBER_DATE_CONTRIBUTORS: Number data contributors (by unique email address)
SEARCH_RESULTS_COUNTRY_DISTRIBUTION: Distribution by Country of Reported Encounters
ENCOUNTER_BY_YEAR_SUBMITTED: Encounter by Year Submitted (not year of sighting)
TOP_TEN_TAGGERS: Top 10 Taggers (Researchers Tagging the Most Individual Animals)
COCO_FORMAT_DESCRIPTION: Export annotations in COCO format for AI/ML training. Includes images and bounding boxes.
CLICK_ANNOTATION_TO_SEE_MATCH_RESULTS: Click on an annotation to view match results
FAILED_TO_ADD_TO_PROJECT: Failed to add encounters to project, please try again.
NAME: Name
ENCOUNTER_NOT_FOUND_DESC: The encounter you are looking for does not exist or has been deleted.
ENCOUNTER_DELETED_DESC: Then encounter has been deleted successfully.
ENCOUNTER_DELETED_ERROR_DESC: There was an error while deleting the encounter. Please try again later or contact admin for help.
DELETE_ENCOUNTER_CONFIRM: This will remove the encounter from the system permanently, including any associated images.
UNASSIGN_AND_DELETE_ENCOUNTER_DESC: This action will detach the encounter from its individual and delete it from the system along with any associated images.
ENCOUNTER_ADD_PROJECT_ERROR: Failed to add encounter to project
ENCOUNTER_REMOVE_FROM_PROJECT_ERROR: Failed to remove encounter from project
NO_ACCESS_TO_ENCOUNTER: You do not have permission to access this page.
ACCESS_LIMITED: Access to this resource is limited.
REQUEST_COLLAB_MESSAGE: Clicking 'Yes' will send a collaboration invitation, including your email, to the data owner. They may contact you for more information so appropriate data-sharing agreements or MoUs can be arranged.
REQUEST_REJECTED: Your request to collaborate with this user has been rejected.
ACCESS_PENDING: Your request to collaborate is pending
CALENDAR_VIEW_DESC: View encounter search results on a calendar by encounter date. Click an encounter ID to open its details.
ADD_ENCOUNTER_TO_PROJECT_DESC: Select one or more encounters to add to a project.
INVALID_LAT_LON: Please enter a valid latitude and longitude
